content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Max. Thank you for considering my apartment for your stay in New York. May I ask what kind of rental price range you are looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price, but I also want to be on good terms with my landlord. Can you tell me more about the apartment?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Max. The apartment is located in a prime location in the city, with easy access to transportation, shopping, and dining. It has a modern kitchen, a cozy living room, and a comfortable bedroom. The apartment also has a balcony with a view of the city skyline. The monthly rent for this apartment is negotiable, but it is currently set at €1,200. Would you be interested in viewing the apartment and discussing the rental price further?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to negotiate the rental price. Can you tell me more about the terms of the lease?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Max. The lease for this apartment is a one-year agreement, with the option to renew for another year. The security deposit is equivalent to one month's rent, and it will be returned to you in full at the end of the lease term, provided that you have fulfilled your obligations under the lease agreement. The utilities, such as electricity, water, and gas, are not included in the rental price, but they can be arranged for at an additional cost. Would you like to discuss these terms further and explore the possibility of negotiating the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
